answers.answer: Hi,With this brief history it is indeed difficulty to say what exactly your problem is. Can you please give us some more details regarding this.1. Was it the first time you experienced?2. What was it you experienced, spinning around sensation or Imbalance?3. For how long did it remain?4. Any headache, reduced hearing or tinnitus associated with it?5. Any history of Diabetes/ Blood pressure?6. Any previous history of cold/ nasal allergy?7. Any more episodes after this incident?RegardsOHNS2010

question: one day while shopping, all of a sudden I got vertigo.Also, my head is draining and i have nasea all the time. any help
title: sinus drip, nausea, and dizziness
